message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this unique product that I think you'll really love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $15000. What do you think?
Thanks for the offer Alice, but $15000 is a bit steep for me. I'm interested in the product, but I'm only willing to pay $10000. Let me know what you think.
I understand you're interested in the product, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you halfway, so I'm offering the product to you for $12500. What do you think?
I appreciate you meeting me halfway, Alice, but I'm still a bit too high.  How about $11000? I'm really hoping to get this deal done, but that's the best I can do right now.
I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $13000. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering the product to you for $12500. What do you think?
Alice, I understand you need to make a profit, but $12500 is still outside my budget.  If you can come down to $11500, I'm ready to buy today.  Let's make this happen!
I appreciate your enthusiasm, Bob, but I'm still not willing to go below $12500. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, so I'm offering the product to you for $12250. What do you think?
Alice, we're getting closer, but $12250 is still a bit too high for me. If you can come down to $11750, I'm ready to close the deal right now. This is my final offer.

I understand you're trying to get the best deal, Bob, but I'm not willing to go below $12000. I'm willing to meet you halfway one last time, so I'm offering the product to you for $12000. This is my final offer.
